title: Server & Network - Switch Port Failure
description: A user whose computer is connected via an Ethernet cable reports they have no network connection.

tasks.description: Ask the user for the wall port number they are plugged into and cross-reference it in the documentation to find the corresponding switch and port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician identifies the exact switch port the user is connected to.

tasks.description: Log in to the network switch and check the status of that port.
tasks.expected_outcome: The switch shows the port is in an 'err-disabled' state, indicating a physical layer issue.

tasks.description: Advise the user to try a different network cable. If that fails, move their connection to a different port on the switch.
tasks.expected_outcome: Moving the user to a different switch port resolves the issue, indicating the original port has failed.
